mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AT_COMPANY_AGENT( CP_CODE, CP_NAME, CP_NAME_ALL, RG_ADDRESS, OFFICE_ADDRESS, CP_OWNER, CP_AGENTER, CP_TEL, CP_EMAIL, USE_TYPE, REMARK ) VALUES( #{cpCode}, #{cpName}, #{cpNameAll}, #{rgAddress}, #{officeAddress}, #{cpOwner}, #{cpAgenter}, #{cpTel}, #{cpEmail}, #{useType}, #{remark} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID as id, CP_CODE as cpCode, CP_NAME as cpName, CP_NAME_ALL as cpNameAll, RG_ADDRESS as rgAddress, OFFICE_ADDRESS as officeAddress, CP_OWNER as cpOwner, CP_AGENTER as cpAgenter, CP_TEL as cpTel, CP_EMAIL as cpEmail, USE_TYPE as useType, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM AT_COMPANY_AGENT WHERE ID=#{id}
